name: game-of-life-wasm4
description: Conway's Game of Life implemented in MoonBit for WASM-4

scripts.bundle: bun run build && mkdir -p dist && bun x wasm4 bundle src/target/wasm-gc/release/build/Game_of_Life.wasm --html dist/cart.html --title 'Game of Life' --description 'Conway"s Game of Life (MoonBit + WASM-4)' && cp src/target/wasm-gc/release/build/Game_of_Life.wasm dist/ && cp src/host_template.html dist/index.html
scripts.dev: bun run bundle && bunx serve -l 5173 dist

author: 王兴家
